channel.title: Compiler
channel.description:
Im Using this server / client : [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=493873.0]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=493873.0[/url]
But the compiler in soruce and client not working.
here's the code's
[code]@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -d .\bin .\src\*.java pause[/code]

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“ipkudown, post:3, topic:440120”][quote author=matzie link=topic=542802.msg3978434#msg3978434 date=1334949184]
Just asking, are you a complete noob to coding?
[/quote]

i dont know how to code .
even i had a great server but i forget almost everything now.

BTW dont reply here if you can’t help[/quote]

i CAN help, it’s just if your a hopeless case i would opt not to…

Point being you didn’t search very hard as i have a posted compiler that works with any java version and x64 system.

Read full topic
